results.title: Plasma levels of E-selectin in normolipemic and hyperlipemic arteriopathic patients after vasoactive and lipid-lowering treatment.
results.text_hl: All @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ underwent a vasoactive treatment for 15 days; group B also underwent a standard hypolipidic diet (phase I NCEP, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ 30% die) groups C and D underwent the same diet associated respectively with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (200 mg/die) and @CHEMICAL_Bezafibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001629 @@@bezafibrate@@@ (400 mg/die).

citations.NLM: Ferlito S, Gallina M, Mugno F, Bisicchia A, Di Salvo MM. Plasma levels of E-selectin in normolipemic and hyperlipemic arteriopathic patients after vasoactive and lipid-lowering treatment. Minerva Cardioangiol. 2000 Mar;48(3):47-52. PMID: 10838833
